name: UpHomeAutomation
0:
”Alexa, Set Ac temperature to 18”
”Alexa Turn off Lights”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
With this skill People can control all their UpHome Automation controlled smart home appliances. 
People need to buy UpHome Automation Smart Home products Like - UpHome 4 Node Switch, 3 Node Switch, Smart IR. After installing and configuring these products in the UpHome Automation Mobile application you can link your account to this skill. 
After linking you can use alexa voice interface to control any of those devices like turning on or off, setting fan speeds or changing channels on TV etc..
